Baseus Picogo 5,000mAh Qi2 15W power bank

Buy for $25 (Reg. $50)

Enter promo code 4MJJF9IS for $12 off.

What we love

This Baseus Picogo power bank is about the size of a credit card, making it one of the smallest out there. It packs a 5,000mAh battery with 15W Qi2 wireless charging and up to 20W USB-C wired charging. We also like its aluminum alloy body that has a built-in kickstand, and it even comes with a 60W braided USB-C cable in the box.

items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday 2025 sale, Samsung is offering its 32-inch 2025 M5 (M50F) Smart Monitor currently down at $119.99 shipped. This is regularly a $270 display, which is now seeing a $70 discount. We recently saw the 27-inch variant of this display drop to $170 all-time low, and today’s deal, which is also matched at Amazon, marks the lowest price we have tracked for this 32-inch variant to date. It’s now fetching $20 less than its previous all-time low and our mention, so be sure to snag it for your setup now if you had this on your wishlist. You can get this in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $200 low today. The retailer is rolling out a 27-page catalog packed with deals on gaming PCs, laptops, components, peripherals, and more, and the main sale officially runs from November 20 to November 29. You don’t have to wait, though – Newegg already has a pre–Black Friday event live right now, complete with price protection, so you can shop early without worry. items.title: Go quick! Pokemon TCG’s elusive Phantasmal Flames set on sale on Amazon
items.summary:
This set has been hard to obtain since its launch, and ETBs haven’t dropped below retail prices often. Seeing it at $79.99 is a solid purchase if you’ve been hunting for one.

Jump on it while you can! Phantasmal Flames ETB ($79.69)

Amazon also has the Booster Bundle for $54.99, which is not bad value either.

The ETB (Elite Trainer Box) includes:

  • 9 booster packs from the Phantasmal Flames expansion.
  • 1 full-art foil promo card featuring Charcadet.
  • 65 themed card sleeves.
  • 40 basic Energy cards.
  • A player’s guide to the expansion.
  • 6 damage-counter dice and 1 coin-flip die.
  • 1 plastic coin.
  • A collector’s box with 6 dividers to hold everything.

🔥 Best card protection accessories & deals

  • Card Sleeves + Top Loaders ($12.99)
  • Fabmaker 9-Pocket Card Binder ($15.29)
  • 600-Count Card Sleeves  ($7.54)
  • Also: Mega Evolutions ETB under $80

items.title: EcoFlow offers new DELTA 3 Max Plus power station with a FREE TRAIL 200 DC unit at $1,099 in flash sale, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, EcoFlow has another short-term flash sale that is ending tonight at midnight PST, providing up to 62% discounts on four offers for that timeframe, including the new DELTA 3 Max Plus power station that comes with a FREE Trail 200 DC 60,000mAh power station at $1,099 shipped, which sadly can’t use any of the extra savings codes from the overall sale. While it carries an $1,899 MSRP since releasing in September, it launched and has been regularly dropped down to $1,099 in the time since when apart of sales, which is where Amazon currently has it priced, though you won’t be getting the FREE Trail 200 DC station with it (valued at $200). We’ve only seen this rate beaten by its $1,044 launch deal (with a bonus savings code), so you’re looking at the next-best price here, especially bundled with the extra power station, giving you a total $1,000 in savings. Head below to learn more about these and the other offers in this flash sale.
